actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United State Code to exempt State-conducted lotteries from certain prohibitions of Federal law.

summary.text: Exempts State-conducted lotteries, gift enterprises, or similar schemes from the criminal provisions of Title 18 of the United States Code, and from the prohibition against delivery of lottery information by the United States Postal Service.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United State Code to exempt State-conducted lotteries from certain prohibitions of Federal law.
